content.prompt: The Hawaiian feather cape was created to be a

choices.label: trade item showing the generosity of the giver

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
